body:
I am generating data from an XML file which outputs certain fields (title, description, link etc). However I need to wrap the link around the rest of the fields. [See live view here](http://www.sagittarius-digital.com/sag-aggregator/sag-aggregator.html), **it takes about 5 seconds to load.** Current HTML structure:

    Read more

    Thu, 12 Dec 2013 12:00:00 GMT

    Category: Our News

title: Wrapping an A tag around array items dynamically generated
